text: Moston is a hamlet in North Shropshire, England, about 10 miles or 16 km north-east of Shrewsbury. In 1870–72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales described Moston as follows: "MOSTON, a township in Stanton-upon-Hineheath parish, Salop; on the river Roden, 3¼ miles ESE of Wem. Pop., 61." ==References== Category:Hamlets in Shropshire
title: Moston, Shropshire
